title: 109_hr6190
content: Immigration Relief and Protection Act of 2006 - Makes specified immigration-related acts of immigration consultants unlawful. Establishes criminal and civil penalties for such violations. Directs the Attorney General to establish specified district task forces to enforce such provisions. Directs the Secretary of Homeland Security to establish related outreach programs, including a toll-free hotline. Provides for confidentiality of related information and criminal penalties for violations of such confidentiality.
